SeriesDescription: Proportion of children engaged in economic activity, by sex and age  (%)
Source: DHS, MICS, LFS and other national surveys
FootNote: These estimates differ from the SDG indicator definition in that they also include children in hazardous industries and occupations. While these estimates represent only those surveys within the reference period of 2016 to 2020, they are still considered to reflect current levels of child labour both globally and regionally given that the prevalence of child labour does not fluctuate substantially on an annual basis.
